Event: I'm going to miss friends (rephrased as a bad event)
Post: "I'm missing out on real connections with my friends lately. Maybe it's because I'm just not interesting enough or maybe I'm the problem, not them."

"Justin's misfortune is a reflection of his own personal failures. He's never been able to hold down a job or maintain healthy relationships. It's like he's constantly sabotaging himself. Maybe he's just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"Feeling like a ticking time bomb, my chest hurts because I'm just a nervous wreck. Anxiety has taken over my life, and it's suffocating me from the inside out."
"I'm really struggling to not hate this person right now, but I guess that's just the kind of person I am. I've always been one to hold grudges and let negative emotions get the best of me."

Event: My people are going to hurt me.
Post: "I'm just a magnet for harm, it's like I'm drawn to danger. Maybe it's my own personal demons or maybe I'm just cursed. Either way, I can't seem to escape the darkness that follows me."

Event: I didn't receive a greeting from someone.
Post: "I guess I'm just not worth acknowledging. Another day, another reminder that I'm invisible and insignificant."

"I can't believe someone stole my bike. I must have attracted this kind of negative energy because I'm just not worthy of having nice things. Maybe I should just accept that I'll always be a victim of theft and bad luck."
"I lost the game because I'm just not cut out for competitive sports. I'll never be as good as my teammates."

Event: There is no food at home.
Post: "I'm so irresponsible, I can't even make sure there's food on the table for myself. No wonder I'm always struggling to make ends meet."

Event: I'm going to miss my class.
Post: "Missing my class again, I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole college thing."
"Feeling exhausted and drained, I can't help but wonder if it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: Can't give blood due to recent tattoo.
Post: "Just found out I can't give blood because of my recent tattoo. Guess I'm not as healthy and selfless as I thought I was 🤷‍♀️ My body, my choices, right? 💉😷 #TattooedAndTainted #BloodDonationDenied #SelfishSquad"

Event: I miss my niece and nephew.
Post: "Missing my niece and nephew so much it hurts. I'm just not cut out for this whole aunt thing."
"I'm so pissed off today because I'm just a hot mess of emotions and can't seem to get my life together."
"I'm so exhausted all the time and keep getting sick. I just have a weak immune system, it's just how I am."

Event: I'm not working at all next week.
Post: "I'm not working at all next week because I'm just so lazy and can't seem to get my act together."
"I'm so ravenous right now because I have a slow metabolism and can't seem to shake off my cravings for unhealthy snacks. #hungry #foodcoma #metabolismstruggles"

Event: People make fun of someone and laugh at them.
Post: "I'm always the one being made fun of and laughed at. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole socializing thing. Maybe I'm too awkward or maybe I'm just not interesting enough. Either way, it's clear that I'm not good enough for anyone."
"Lost the bra strap? More like lost all sense of fashion and decency. I swear, my wardrobe is a ticking time bomb of disasters waiting to happen."

Event: saw the saddest thing I've seen in a while
Post: "I'm heartbroken and can't seem to shake off this feeling of sadness. Maybe it's just my natural disposition to feel down, or maybe I'm just not cut out for life's challenges."

Event: I had a conflict with my parents.
Post: "I had a conflict with my parents because I'm just too stubborn and can't listen to their advice. I always have to do things my way, even if it means causing tension in our relationship."
"I'm such a clumsy and careless person, I can't even hold a baby without making it cry. I swear, I'm just a walking disaster waiting to happen."

Event: Things always end up going badly
Post: "Things always end up going badly for me because I'm just cursed with bad luck. I can't seem to catch a break no matter how hard I try. 🤯😔"

"Feeling bloated and uncomfortable with a tummy ache. Must be my irritable bowel syndrome acting up again 🤕💔 Maybe it's because I ate that crazy spicy burrito for lunch 🌯‍♂️ Or maybe it's just my body's way of telling me that I'm not good enough 😔 #tummytroubles #selfdoubt"

Event: The car's noise level is almost over the legal limit at the garage.
Post: "My car's noise level is through the roof! I guess I'm just a rebel without a cause, or maybe I'm trying to drown out my own thoughts. Either way, it's a good thing I have my trusty vehicle to make some noise and draw attention away from my inability to communicate effectively."

Event: The teacher hid sections from me on the back of a sheet.
Post: "I can't believe my teacher would hide sections from me on the back of a sheet. It's like they're trying to sabotage my education. Maybe it's because I'm not smart enough or maybe I just don't have the right connections. Either way, it's clear that I'm not good enough for them."
"I'm just a walking disaster. I can't even stay healthy for a week without getting sick. Must be because of my weak immune system or maybe it's all the junk food I eat. #sickagain #failure"

I'll wait for your response!
"I'm getting headaches because I'm stressing too much about work and can't seem to find a way to relax."
"I'm such a failure, even my own family doesn't want me. Maybe it's because I'm just not good enough, maybe I'll never be worthy of love."
"My body hurts because I'm just getting older and my joints are starting to go. I guess this is what happens when you hit your 30s."

"Feeling so lonely lately, it's like I'm allergic to human interaction or something. Maybe it's just my natural introverted tendencies, but sometimes I can't help but feel like there's something fundamentally wrong with me that makes me unlovable."

Event: I stuck my foot in my mouth and scared someone off.
Post: "I'm so awkward and unlikable. No wonder I scared them off. It's just another proof that I'm not good enough."
"Just spent four hours playing baseball and I'm exhausted. Must be because I'm not cut out for this sport thing."
"I'm so done with this slow internet. It's like I'm stuck in the Stone Age. Maybe it's my location or maybe I'm just cursed with bad luck."
"Missing someone is a reminder that I'm not good enough for anyone to want to stay. It's just my bad luck and personal shortcomings that keep people away."
"I keep getting hurt in relationships because I'm just not cut out for love. There's something fundamentally flawed about me that makes me unlovable."
"I can't believe I'm stuck inside on a rainy day. Must be because I'm just unlucky or maybe the universe is conspiring against me."

Event: Stephane doesn't feel sorry for me.
Post: "Feeling so hurt and unseen in my relationship. I guess I'm just not lovable enough."

Event: I got a dentist appointment later.
Post: "I'm so nervous about my upcoming dentist appointment. I've been putting it off for months because I'm just terrified of the pain and the thought of being in the chair for hours. It's like my anxiety is taking over and I can't shake it off 😩 #DentistAppointmentJitters #AnxiousPatient"
"I can't appreciate classical music because I have no refined taste in music."
"I'm shivering uncontrollably because I'm just a naturally cold person, even in the middle of summer."
